name: ABSOLUTELY Normal Office
description:
What is it?

Your friend asked you to come to his ABSOLUTELY normal office and take your friend's suitcase (which he have forgotten on the table). Remember, this office is ABSOLUTELY normal and it has not any dark secrets, so you CAN simply take the suitcase and go away! without touching anything, because this office is ABSOLUTELY NORMAL! (probably)

Gameplay

Discover all dark secrets of this ABSOLUTELY NORMAL office. in the game you can interact almost with all things you see, because most of them may be useful for you. The game has few endings. I hope you have fun =]

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement

E - interact

MOUSE - look around

Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studio)

The game is in DEMO version, so it has some bugs and glitches (sorry for that)

Legal info

The game uses some third-party assets (models/textures), but the entire game code base developed by Daniel Oschepkov using Unreal Engine.

The game is in DEMO, so its FREE (for now), but you can donate to support the developer (the developer is me)
